recipe.title: How to Make a Smoothie Bowl
recipe.intro: A smoothie bowl is a thick smoothie served in a bowl with toppings. It is a colourful and healthy breakfast or snack. You can use any fruit you like!
recipe.ingredients: frozen banana, frozen mango, aÃ§aÃ­ powder, coconut milk, honey, granola, fresh berries, coconut flakes, chia seeds
steps: **Peel** and **freeze** two bananas the night before.
**Put** the frozen banana, frozen mango, aÃ§aÃ­ powder, and coconut milk into a blender.
**Blend** until thick and smooth. Do not add too much liquid. The mixture should be thicker than a normal smoothie.
**Arrange** the toppings in rows: granola, fresh berries, coconut flakes, and chia seeds.
**Drizzle** some honey on top and **serve** immediately. **Eat** with a spoon, not a straw!

quiz1.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Eat with a spoon, not a straw!"

review.text: Mojo's CafÃ© is right on the Esplanade. I came here for Sunday brunch with my housemates. I ordered the aÃ§aÃ­ smoothie bowl and it was beautiful. The purple colour was so bright. It had granola, banana, coconut, and dragon fruit on top. The taste was fresh and fruity. My housemate Ben had the green smoothie bowl with spinach and kiwi. We both agreed it was the best brunch spot in Cairns. The prices are reasonable and the atmosphere is relaxed.

quiz2.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"the green smoothie bowl with spinach and kiwi"

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Morning! What can I get for you?

lines.speaker: Ethan
lines.text: Hey! Can I see the smoothie bowl menu?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Sure! We have aÃ§aÃ­, mango, and green smoothie bowls.

lines.speaker: Ethan
lines.text: I will go with the mango one. What toppings does it have?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: It comes with granola, coconut, passionfruit, and chia seeds.

lines.speaker: Ethan
lines.text: Can I swap the chia seeds for peanut butter?

lines.speaker: Ethan
lines.text: Can I add an extra scoop of protein powder?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Sure, that is three dollars extra. So the mango bowl with peanut butter and protein. Anything to drink?

lines.speaker: Ethan
lines.text: Just a glass of water, please.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Coming right up! That is eighteen dollars altogether.

quiz3.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Can I swap the chia seeds for peanut butter?"

part_a.full_text: Hey, are you free on Sunday morning? Yes, I am! Do you want to go for brunch? That sounds great! Where should we go? How about that new cafÃ© near the lagoon? I heard they have amazing smoothie bowls. Perfect! What time shall we meet? How about ten o'clock? Sounds good. I will see you there!

I heard they have amazing smoothie

part_b.full_text: Hi everyone! Welcome to our new video. Today we are visiting Bowl of Sunshine, a smoothie bowl cafÃ© in Cairns. The owner is Sarah, and she started this cafÃ© two years ago. They use only local fruit from North Queensland farms. Their most popular bowl is the Tropical Sunrise. It has mango, pineapple, and coconut milk. It costs fourteen dollars. They also do a kids' size for eight dollars. The cafÃ© is open seven days a week, from seven in the morning until two in the afternoon. You can also order online for pickup. Sarah says her favourite topping is macadamia nuts from a farm near Mareeba.

try_it.example: My smoothie bowl has frozen strawberries and banana. I blend them with almond milk. I put granola, honey, and kiwi on top. It is pink and pretty!
